thread.section_title: OnDeck Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OnDeck | ondeck.com
thread.title: Kay Poole, VTEC Home Solutions, LLC
thread.title_full: OnDeck reviewed by Kay Poole, VTEC Home Solutions, LLC

author: Kay Poole, VTEC Home Solutions, LLC
title: Kay Poole, VTEC Home Solutions, LLC
text: On Deck is truly real. I set out a goal in 2016 that I would take my business to the next level and began working on building my business credit. I saw an advertise ad while watching Shark Tank. I went to my computer and read the information on Monday, put in the information that night, and by Wednesday my account was funded with $6000.00. Please know this took me by surprise and now I am willing to share this with every business owner who wants that start.
